entry.title: WIND WARNING , Waterton Park
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:36 AM MST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: 5.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Waterton Park Gate 07:00 AM MST Monday 26 December 2022
Temperature: 5.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.0 kPa falling
Humidity: 75 %
Dewpoint: 1.1°C
Wind: SW 20 km/h gust 37 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Mainly cloudy. High 9 with temperature falling to 6 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries near the British Columbia border. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 70 becoming west 70 gusting to 100 this afternoon. High 9 with temperature falling to 6 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: A few showers. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few showers beginning near midnight except periods of snow near the British Columbia border. Wind west 70 km/h gusting to 100 diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 this evening then becoming light overnight. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: A few showers. High 6.
entry.summary: A few showers ending near noon then cloudy. Periods of snow near the British Columbia border. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High 6. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Cloudy. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 26 December 2022
